name: Back Slash Sandbox
description:
This is a game that was partially inspired by people playground and partially inspired by another person who made a clone of ppg.

In this video I played the (original) clone game : 

In this video I explained why I decided to make a clone myself and began making the game:

This game is 100% free and will soon become a full on free sandbox game that is a free substitution for the original game. 

If you are Studio minus or are a developer etc for people playground, you can email me at klipbitz@gmail.com provide proof, and then ill remove the game if you feel the need.
